summary: This document is an email chain regarding a press inquiry from Mary Margaret Olohan of the Daily Caller News Foundation to the SDNY (Southern District of New York). The inquiry asks for comment on defense attorney David Markus's assertion that he did not violate SDNY rules by writing an op-ed comparing Bill Cosby and Ghislaine Maxwell. The SDNY recipients indicate they declined to comment and had previously filed a letter brief on the matter.
